item1.title: What is Psynexa and how does it work?
item1.content: Psynexa is an AI-powered application offering mental health support. It analyzes users' emotional states, provides personalized recommendations, and supports mental health through techniques like meditation and breathing exercises. Its user-friendly interface allows you to track your daily mood and build mental resilience through regular practice.

item2.title: Is Psynexa paid?
item2.content: Psynexa offers both free and premium features. Basic features are available for free, while more advanced features and personalized content are accessible through our premium subscription plan.

item3.title: Is my data secure?
item3.content: User privacy and data security are our top priorities. All your data is encrypted and stored on secure servers. We never share your personal information with third parties and implement the latest security protocols.

item4.title: Who can use Psynexa?
item4.content: Psynexa is designed for anyone looking to improve or maintain their mental health. It can be used by anyone, regardless of age, seeking support for stress management, anxiety reduction, or general mental well-being.

item5.title: How can I get started?
item5.content: To get started, simply download the Psynexa app and create an account. A short assessment will then be conducted for your personalized experience, and the app will begin offering you customized recommendations.
